name: Site Establishment and Safety Checklist
Details
Delivery and goods lift location
Delivery requirements i.e. booking process
On site storage / office location
Site specific restrictions i.e. noise / starting times
Ductwork Checklist
Details
Rectangular duct installed as per latest drawing
Duct flanges firmly bolted and sealed where required
Cleats installed as required
Correct hanger spacing / supports installed
DW insulated where required and damage free
Ductwork restrained for wind/seismic where required
Spiral installed as per latest drawing
Spiral joins sealed correctly
Correct hanger spacing / supports installed for spiral
Spiral insulated where required and damage free
Additional taping/sealing to medium/high pressure spiral
Pops & flex installed as per latest drawing
Correct hanger spacing / supports installed for flex
Free from support off other services
Flexible duct connections completed correctly
Blade dampers installed as documented and left in the open position
BD pop access panel coordinated and marked
Cushion boxes installed as per latest drawing
Balancing dampers installed as documented and left in the open position
Location of register coordinted with other services and marked on plan or floor
Volume Control Dampers installed as per latest drawing
Motorised dampers installed as per latest drawing / actuator fit off
Damper access panels coordinated and marked
Pipework
Details
Pipework installed as per latest drawings
Pipework installed level and free of damage
All joins welded / crimped as per manufacturer's instructions
Air bleeds installed in pipework where required
Riser or area branch valve access panel coordinated and marked
Correct hanger spacing / supports installed for pipe runs
No other services suspended from pipework
Correct coil valves installed as per schedule
Test points, drains and bleeders installed where required
Coil valves accessible and not blocking any service points
Coil valveset access panel coordinated and marked
Pipework lagged where required and correct thickness
Pipework labelled
Pipework secitons though fire walls lagged as per test report
HHW Pressure Test – ITR attached
HHW Flushed - plan, photos of flow readings and water quality attached
CHW Pressure Test – ITR attached
CHW Flushed - plan, photos of flow readings and water quality attached
Drain trapped where required
Correct hanger spacing / fall
Drain tested
Drain pump installed level and tested
Drain terminates at a tundish
Drains, pump and tundish access for maintenance.
Plantroom / Outdoor Equipment
Details
AHU correctly supported as per project engineering requirements
Correct AHU installed as per latest drawing
Access to filter bank / filters installed
Access to all relevant controls, isolators and maintenance items
Floor or Platform Mounted Thermal Plant correctly supported as per project engineering requirements
Maintenance and ventilation clearance maintained as per manufacturer's specs
All manufacturer specific requirements have been provided in addition to project requirements
